item.title: 1.24.70-rc
item.description:
## Current Release Notes * Minor updates * Improve mod loading performance * Highlight create button if no collections
## Release Notes 1.24 * Update dependencies * Handle replace path in basic mod merge * Bypass steam thinking that Irony is a game host process (valve should seriously tweak logic of theirs) * Add conflict solver modes which skip localization * Write last known Irony location to %appdata% directory so other programs can find it * Add support for metadata descriptor type games (Victoria 3 support) * Add option to ignore update * Improve mod loading performance

## Release Notes 1.24 * Update dependencies * Handle replace path in basic mod merge * Bypass steam thinking that Irony is a game host process (valve should seriously tweak logic of theirs) * Add conflict solver modes which skip localization * Write last known Irony location to %appdata% directory so other programs can find it * Add support for metadata descriptor type games (Victoria 3 support) * Add option to ignore update * Improve mod loading performance

## Current Release Notes * Fix maximized window state not being restored due to framework bug
## Release Notes 1.23 * Update dependencies * Fix OSX package publish procedure rendering launching games inoperable * Small fixes * Improve game definition saving and loading memory consumption * Add inverse search filters * Update fios\lios stellaris handling
